dineroMarketAddress.repayCardInfo: Select a DNR balance % to repay. The contract will never overcharge you!
dineroMarketAddress.borrowFormLoanInfoTip1: The maximum amount of Dinero this market can lend.
dineroMarketAddress.borrowFormLoanInfoTip2:
Total amount of DNR owed (principal + interest
rate) including the planned transaction
dineroMarketAddress.borrowFormLoanInfoTip3:
If the collateral token drops to this price,
you are at risk of liquidation.
dineroMarketAddress.borrowFormLoanInfoTip4:
If this value reaches 0, you are at risk of
liquidation.
dineroMarketAddress.positionTip1: Amount of Tokens Deposited as Collateral
dineroMarketAddress.positionTip2: USD Value of the Collateral Deposited
dineroMarketAddress.positionTip3:
The amount of DNR owed to the market
+ interest rate
dineroMarketAddress.positionTip4:
Collateral Price at which your Loan
Position will be Liquidated
dineroMarketAddress.positionTip6:
Maximum amount of collateral you can
withdraw
dineroMarketAddress.loanInfoCustomTip1: A LTV of 50% means that for every 1 dollar of collateral, a user can borrow up to 0.50 cents of DNR.
dineroMarketAddress.loanInfoCustomTip2: This is a penalty the borrower pays in collateral to the liquidator.
dineroMarketAddress.loanInfoCustomTip3: This is the cost of borrowing DNR. It is expressed as an annual percentage of your loan value. The tax is paid in DNR.
dineroMarketAddress.loanInfoLpFreeMarketTip1: The profits from farming your collateral. It is expressed as an annual percentage and calculated in USD.
dineroMarketAddress.loanInfoLpFreeMarketTip2: Number of $INT tokens you have accrued
dineroMarketAddress.loanInfoLpFreeMarketTip3: Value of your rewards in USD
dineroMarketAddress.userLTVTip:
If this value reaches 100%,
you might get liquidated
dineroMarketAddress.toastError: Borrow or collateral amount are wrong
